content: As you get closer to the first Keeper's Shrine of the area, you'll see a large group of soldiers appear. Clear these out and then you can activate the shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
As you get closer to the first Keeper's Shrine of the area, you'll see a large group of soldiers appear. Clear these out and then you can activate the shrine.
